pkgmetadata.longdescription: Py-Redis-Utils==============Useful when a seeded redis database is needed during test-cyclesOverview--------- helpers for seeding / clearing local redis databases during testing- Functions- dump\_to\_file(path, redis\_conn = None, host = "localhost", port= 6379 ) - create a pickled dump of redis- load\_from\_file(path, redis\_conn = None, host = "localhost", port= 6379 ) - load a pickled file into redis- clear(redis\_conn = None, host = "localhost", port= 6379 ) - clear a redis database- This is good for any testing environment and works well in a setup / breadkown Nose testing environment
